On Track to the Future

We believe train travel is the backbone of sustainable transport. Our mission is to make it smarter, faster, and more accessible through cutting-edge tracking technology.

Our Journey

Read full story
lightbulb

Concept Founded

2021

Born from a frustration with delayed trains and outdated paper schedules, our founders sketched the first version of TrainTracker on a napkin in a bustling station cafe.

rocket_launch

First Beta Launch

2022

We released our first beta to 500 enthusiastic commuters. Their feedback shaped our core real-time tracking algorithm.

code

Open Source API Release

2023

Believing in transparency, we opened our API to developers, sparking a wave of community-built integrations and tools.

public

Global Expansion

2024

Today, we cover over 50 major cities worldwide, helping millions of commuters navigate their daily journeys with ease.

Views from the Rails

Built by the community, for the community.

We are proud open source contributors. Our core tracking engine is public, allowing developers to build better tools for everyone. Check out our repositories or join the team.
